name: City Police Helicopter Flight Simulator
description:
Turn yourself into a professional policeman – courageous pilot of awesome police helicopter! Fly over the city, lay down the law, control and prevent crime. Download City Police Helicopter Flight Simulator and have one of the most unusual flight experience in your life!
If you are fond of addicitve flight simulators like helicopters pilot simulator games so you will be absolutely happy to try this one! Feel like experienced helicopter pilot cop assigned to a police station and get ready for seting on a chase mission operating and save the civilians. Check up your perfect pilot skills and apprehend as many criminals as you can playing our new game City Police Helicopter Flight Simulator!
This city is in danger. The city is full of pushers, robbers, murderers. The big city has become a pit of thugs, who needs to be eliminated. Police forces waging war against rising waves of criminal scum, and you can be the savior and the hero of this city.
Provide air support with your helicopter, chase fugitive criminals and save the city!
Take a sit in the cockpit and become a real police helicopter pilot with City Police Helicopter Flight Simulator! Test your flying skills and bring all the missions to a successful conclusion. Gain height, avoid crashes and try to catch as many criminals as you can!
City Police Helicopter Flight Simulator features:
Realistic policeman aircrafts - high-output helicopters
Complete dangerous missions to capture all the criminals - murders, thieves, killers, robbers
Earn points to upgrade your helicopter
Use all your pilot skills to avoid crashes and save the city
Become the best police pilot ever
Get your unique experience and turn for a while into airforce city policeman with City Police Helicopter Flight Simulator! It’s time to jump into your 'copter and put everything in order here!
